website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a compact model that produces beautiful photos in 2 sizes – once you complete the process of setting it up.
pros: Produces vibrant, borderless photos in 2 sizes – 4x6 and 5x7
Wireless, and is compatible with most smart devices
cons: Set up can be difficult, especially for the tech-challenged
If you plan to print a lot of photos, replacing cartridges can get pricey

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Price & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommend. We used this printer for heavy photo booth use for 8 hours/day for 4 days straight and it has not given us any problems. Picture quality and speed are just not comparable to other printers on the market for this price - even the customers asked us for the part number of this printer. Will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HELLO HOME

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased thus far (day one!), particularly with the color quality (fair skin subjects).
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased thus far (day one!), particularly with the color quality of fair skin subjects (my daughter). I actually purchased the Canon SELPHY CP1300 first, as it is half the price and had good reviews, but, it did a poor job for me on reproducing fair-skin photos, making their skin look ash-white like ghosts. You can read my review for the Canon SELPHY CP1300 if you want more detail. Thus I returned the Canon and kept the Epson.
customer_reviews.author: SM123

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Epson Quality Still Around!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is amazing. It was so easy to set up and prints beautifully. I've used Epson printers for many years and I am never disappointed. The one button touch setup wizard added this printer directly to my home network and once I downloaded the Epson iPrint app, I was printing photos from my Apple phone in about 10 minutes. The ink that is used in this portable compact printer is great for scrapbookers - it lasts for many, many years. The quality of the photos are terrific. Save, having to go to the big box stores for printing, get this printer today.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica I

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer! I had a Canon Selphy, but it kept giving me error messages for things that weren't wrong. This printer works like a dream and is so easy to print right from my phone, which is what I wanted. It takes any brand of photo paper, unlike some printers *cough*Canon*cough* which is helpful. The prints are quite nice and vibrant and they actually print true 4x6....unlike some printers *cough*cough*CANON*cough*cough*. And I appreciate that I can also print up to a 5x7!
customer_reviews.author: jb555

customer_reviews.title: Nice little photo printer
customer_reviews.text: This photo printer is worth the price. The size is perfect and the quality is pretty good. The replacement cartridge & paper packs are a little spendy but the cartridges seem to last for more than the 100 photo papers that come with, so that's a plus. Overall the convenience of being able to print your photos whenever wherever is worth the little extra you pay vs taking them to places like Walmart or Walgreens. And the quality might even be slightly better. I would recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable photo printer
customer_reviews.text: The Epson Picturemate PM-400 prints stunning color 4x6 photos and Ink the that came with machine lasted a long time before it needed changing which was a surprise. I was considering the Selphy but choose the Epson because its Ink costs less and prints more pictures than the Canon. It also prints 5 x 7 size.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say enough about this little printer. Would give it 6 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This printer is fanstastic. Used Adobe Lightroom to process photos of Santa and kids for a charity event, and printed the photos on-site so the guests could take them home. Printed nearly 200 photos in batches of around 100 each. It cranked out the photos without any hitches. There was one paper jam that only took a second to fix, and I’m not sure what the cause was in any event, but once fixed, the printer just kept printing. Quality of the photos is very good. People remarked at how the photos almost looked “real.” Used Epson OEM paper and ink.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer for my wife. She wanted something that woul print from her smartphone with no hassle This did the job Easy set-up following on screen instructions. I printed first time she tried it. Very nice quality in both 4x6 and 5x7
customer_reviews.author: grfx

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good basic photo printer
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to figure out how to print wirelessly from my phone and the directions weren't very clear. Once I figured that out, however, printing photos is quick and easy. My only major complaint is that it doesn't always automatically grab the photo paper when printing and I have to push the paper down to help it. Can be cumbersome when I'm printing numerous photos.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hicka

customer_reviews.title: Ink is hard to find online or in stores
customer_reviews.text: Beware- it is hard to find the correct ink for this. I almost sent it back because the photo paper it came with printed terribly. I decided to order a new ink and paper set- and it worked great. I have found that I have to lighten up my phone photos or they print too dark. Photos from computer print perfectly. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: travelllllller

customer_reviews.title: Wow factor approved!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know for sure how this little printer would stack up against the old HP Photosmart that failed. Wow! Small foot print, easy wi-fi setup and 1 unit ink cartridge to start. To finish are spectacular prints that far exceed the old machine (God bless her LOL). If you just want to print near professional quality color prints from your digital camera, this thing is for you. Can't comment on prints per ink cartridge or long term durability so I'll leave it at that.
customer_reviews.author: Webfarmer

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had these back when I was in high school (would have had the most legit IDs ever) lol The color and ink is really good for the value and comfort of instantly printing at ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality for a home printer. I wish they had these back when I was in high school (would have had the most legit IDs ever) lol The color and ink is really good for the value and comfort of instantly printing at home. I highly recommend this over anything in the market these days
customer_reviews.author: Harry Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love how easy  it is to use
customer_reviews.text: Too bad the picture quality isn't better, the back round comes out pretty nice but it doesn't do a great job on people, the skin looks pale. As far as using it, I love it, I just take a picture on my phone, open the picture and hit print. It works just as easy on my Ipad and computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: It's as simple as that! This printer beats the competition on every level EXCEPT price. If you can afford it, just buy it. I bought the Selphy first and returned it. The picture quality is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for scrapbooking
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever been working on a scrapbook and damaged or misplaced a photo? Especially when you are at a day or weekend crop, this is incredibly frustrating. This compact machine will save that page and produces better quality photos (up to 5x7) than my printer at home. You wouldn't want to print a huge batch of photos from this, but the single print price is decent. This is definitely a luxury, but every time I use it, I'm glad I purchased it. Works well with my Mac too.
customer_reviews.author: ryem

customer_reviews.title: easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: love this little printer!~ if you are looking for a quick way to print pictures, this is your device! installed easily, and even my Iphone 6 S plus (which is getting outdated) populates the printer on my wireless Bluetooth devices! easy easy easy!
customer_reviews.author: P. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Photos print very light.
customer_reviews.text: Great size, sharp picture, but no matter what, the pictures were too light. I didn’t like any of the pictures. Did some reading and there are no settings to make the photos print darker. I’m very disappointed and do not recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Castle12

customer_reviews.title: Perfect photo printer for scrapbooking!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Best purchase I’ve made recently. Pictures clear, bright, sharp. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use....looks great
customer_reviews.text: So this whole system is kind of pricey. Both to buy and the cost per print. BUT, printing a 4x6 is SO EASY with this printer. And the pix look great. So if you value ease of use over price, you should pick this printer
customer_reviews.author: Computer Guy

customer_reviews.title: Canon Selphy...bye...bye!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Canon Selphy 1200, including the optional battery. I recently have purchased the Epson PM 400. I am no longer using the Canon. That is the "bottom-line".
customer_reviews.author: WilliamA

customer_reviews.title: Prints really great pictures. I am able to edit and zoom ...
customer_reviews.text: Prints really great pictures. I am able to edit and zoom in. Down side is that my old printer allowed me to brighten the picture and this printer does not. Also prints less than 100 pictures per ink cartridge which is MUCH less than my old printer. Also not able to find ink cartridge in stores and have to order from amazon or from Epson . Upside is that it is quick , pictures are good and light and small enough for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R Cribb

customer_reviews.title: Love this photo printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really terrific photo printer capable of printing 4X6 and 5X7 pictures. The photos look gorgeous and the printing is relatively quick. You can print directly from your iPhone or computer and unlike other photo printers, any photo paper will work well. My one complaint is that there is no way to change the size of the print from your iPhone or computer. Instead, you must go to the printer and manually change sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Hillel Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: Great photo printer - prints 5x7
customer_reviews.text: This printer is pricier than others however it prints 5x7 and the quality is amazing. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: John Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer, but stopped working out of the blue
customer_reviews.text: This printer worked great for a few months! Put it on a shelf to store and when I went back to use again the power resets every 45 seconds so you can't connect or use at all. Reached out to the seller and to Amazon and both said they wouldn't do anything. Such a shame that it is a faulty product and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Halfer

customer_reviews.title: A terrific photo printer!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality, easy to set up and easy to use. Unlike the Canon Selphy CP1300 I bought two weeks ago and just junked because it was none of the forgoing. I had an Epson PictureMate 240 before, which worked well for many years before giving up. I should have replaced it with another Epson rather than a Canon. Stupid me, buying a printer from a camera company and thinking it would work as well as an Epson!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer 13411

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, a little difficult to sync with things.  Goes through a LOT of ink.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, a little difficult to sync with things. Goes through a LOT of ink.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Lewis

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several photo printers and, being very dissatisfied with the quality, returned them. I did not expect much from this small, single ink cartridge printer. The quality is FANTASTIC! Great, true tones. No pixilation. Great edge-to-edge printing! Wish it printed 8x10, but I understand this is not the market spot Epson was going for. It is also very portable friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Go Astros!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give as a gift because I have one exactly like this and love it! The picture quality is amazing and beautiful. Easy to set up. Print your photos from your cell phone wirelessly, so easily. I highly recommend this printer. Prints 5x7 or 4x6 photos.
customer_reviews.author: treese

customer_reviews.title: Not a printer. It’s a shirt.
customer_reviews.text: The description of it being a refurbished printer was not correct. I received a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wattigney

customer_reviews.title: Reliable seller!  Great prices!  Lightning fast ship!  Why go anywhere else?
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't have a working camera right now, the package arrived at warp speed! I enjoy being able to print out pictures at home and Epson PictureMate is fabulous. Very nice seller and was very helpful. Plus the price was GREAT !!!! If you need anything in cameras, printers, etc., if they don't have it, you don't need it!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year old and will not print good quality. We have replaced ink and paper and still no good.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E. Crook

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Prints!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer as well as the Canon Selphy and did my own comparison of picture quality; the PictureMate produced much better quality photos. The Selphy was returned. As a bonus, I can also print my own 5x7’s, which cannot be done with the Selphy.. I printed multiple 5x7’s and mounted them on foam board to add to a wall collage. You cannot tell the difference between lab prints and PictureMate prints.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: noisy poor pics quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had photo printers for many years, this is the worst, by far. Noisy, poor print quality-pics invariably come out several shades darker than what I see on editing screen on decent Dell laptop. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dtrees

customer_reviews.title: Fast but quality not good.
customer_reviews.text: Image quality is not good. I used epson ink and photo paper. Would not recommend it. It is fast and does connect wirelessly. But id you’re looking for quality this is not the one. Disappointed coming from epson.
customer_reviews.author: Kopy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an expensive photo printer. Real easy to set up and use although photos just don’t feel the same as getting them from a printer. If you are using it for like a photo booth type gig than it will work great. Prints off your phone with ease and fairly quick.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: No happy, returned.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Had to return because we could not get it to work. We purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality photos
customer_reviews.text: Using for fundraisers, quality is amazing, the only thing that would make it better is battery for outside events
customer_reviews.author: amy sornberger

customer_reviews.title: Great phone photo printer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Epson product I've purchased in about 15 years. I was very excited to get this printer and it works so well. It's great for those 4 x 6 phone photos. I have used it with an iPhone 7. I'll edit this when I print from the iPhone X. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sn315on

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance you’ll get a good print
customer_reviews.text: So sometimes it prints beautifully and then sometimes it just gives up. I can’t seem to attach pictures right now but the ink will just not print on half the picture or the colors will be all wrong. It’s a shame as when it works it’s great but you waste a lot of expensive paper and ink with the trial and error. Usually I send in for printing but like option to print a few at home or now that all deliveries are delayed for Covid-19, seeing them downsides more of this printer. My fault for not opening sooner and now I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup, very good print quality. Only does one thing (prints pictures) but does very, very well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great pics, had a little trouble figuring out how ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pics, had a little trouble figuring out how to set up the WiFi, but when we did the printer worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Nortz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful prints
customer_reviews.text: Even after I registered it, I still cant use it with wifi. I have to put in the chip from my phone to print from. Excellent quality is why I put up with its faults. 4x6 or smaller only
customer_reviews.author: gina K graves

customer_reviews.title: Print Pictures wherever you go!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this printer very much. I took it to a party and was able to print everybody a picture with their friends!
customer_reviews.author: Anna W. Heath

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS PHOTOS
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the photos is unsurpassed by any printer. My HP can't compete with the vividness. Having said that, it was a little difficult to set up. But, once i "read the directions exactly as written" i was able to use it with my PC instead of a photo card (who wants all the photos taken?). It can be difficult to operate from the printer because the settings are all on the photo. Overall, I would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: W F

customer_reviews.title: Quality of picture is very good
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is really good. At least 4x6 and 5x7 is awesome. I wish they had wireless connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: D. N. Barman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this little printer
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little printer! It's fast , easy to use with SD Card, and the finished photo's are Beautiful!!! I used both glossy and pearl finished papers. (I did not try it with wi/fi or Bluetooth.) The only thing I did not like, and that may be the camera. (Nikon coolpixs P900) Using a cord connect, I would have to remove the cord in-between each photo taken. Really a nice little printer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni D

customer_reviews.title: Prints great pictures. Compared HP Glossy paper to Epson
customer_reviews.text: Prints great pictures. Compared HP Glossy paper to Epson. Better quality print of on the Epson photo paper. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cathey

customer_reviews.title: This little printer makes great photos. Excellent quality and it prints them fast ...
customer_reviews.text: This little printer makes great photos. Excellent quality and it prints them fast too. I think the prints come out much better than the ones I have printed at the local pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Egry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome printer!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, sharp photos. I haven't had a standard sized desktop printer that even compares in quality to the PM 400, when it comes to printing photos. I use this printer solely for scrapbooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: prints well - not meant for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: The printers print beautifully , bit these printers cannot withstand heavy use. If you are just planning on printing a few pictures, you will be fine. But if you want to print out a lot of pictures all at once, the paper will start to jam after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M

customer_reviews.title: Best picture quality hands down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another printer but after seeing a friend of mine with the Epson PictureMate, I took what I had back to the store and purchased myself an Epson PictureMate. Best picture quality hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Aliaskb

customer_reviews.title: Print quality is excellent in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is excellent in my opinion. Set up was simple, once connected to wifi printing from different devices is easy. Priced kind of high, make sure you buy extra paper and ink. It goes fast and the printer doesn't come with much paper
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer!
customer_reviews.text: Love my little printer!!!!! I scrapbook and it prints my pictures nicely and in the size I want with the help of Project Lufe app!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best picture printer I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I am a picture nut and with three grand children, I take a lot of pics. I have used many difference "photo printers" and have been blown away by how beautiful the images are from this one. Crystal clear, vivid colors and so easy to print from my phone or from the disk out of my digital camera. My husband bought this for me a year ago and had to buy one for our daughter-in-law for Christmas last year. Amazing printer!
customer_reviews.author: sim1850

customer_reviews.title: We have used this printer since 2017 and have loved it ever day!
customer_reviews.text: We have print thousands of pictures with this printer since May 2017. Picture quality is very good. It does crop a little bit around the edges, maybe 5mm or so, but it's not that big of a deal for every day printing. If you're going to print a large amount of a picture (like for invitations or handouts), just print one out first to make sure it looks right. I wish there was a ink subscription service (like HP Instant Ink) for this printer. The best practice for us is to always have a spare ink cartridge available.
customer_reviews.author: J. DiFranco

customer_reviews.title: Photo printing at home
customer_reviews.text: This will get you the high end 4x6 or 5x7 photos you want. Just be prepared to spend $50 per 100 photos if you go ultra glossy paper and T320 ink cartridges. App is simple, I typically print directly from phone rather than computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Works but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Works well for photos. But ink is a little pricey. Seems to run out quickly. but if you want a fast way to print right from your phone the app and printer work well.
customer_reviews.author: DoesItSuck

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: All we wanted a good pic printer and this device is perfect! Pics are vivid, connects to every device with little effort. Small, doesn’t take up much room at all compared to our old multi function printer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We use this to print name tags at events. I tested the photo printing and was very impressed! The compact size is great for travel. Printing the photos was very easy. To print the name tags I just had to do a little set up and it was ready to go! The price here was much better than other places too.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Trosky

customer_reviews.title: Very complicated. The PM-300 100 TIMES BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Setting up too complicated. Screen too small and locating pictures even harder. Would like to exchange for new PM-300 which is easy and less complicated. They blew it on this reconfigured design!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Prints better than a $700 pro Canon printer
customer_reviews.text: This little printer is a beast. It prints really fast, consistently high-quality photos (no streaks, no interrupted print jobs). We put this printer up against my friend's $700 Canon pro printer and both agreed the photos look better from the Epson. It was also super easy to set up, is small and can be tucked away in a drawer, and is really portable. I would love for Epson to put out a similarly economical, high-quality printer for larger print sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like value of the price the quality of the pics ...
customer_reviews.text: I like value of the price the quality of the pics are great...i would and have recommend it to friends.....i just like it better if there was a way to lighten pics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prints very nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this printer for my wife in Christmas she does lot of scrapbook the printer is small and light it can fit in a bag the reason for this choice was from a lady on YouTube she does scrapbooking and was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Julio Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this printer
customer_reviews.text: This the absolute best photo printer I have ever used. I have been printing my photos for years to use in scrapbooking and I am blown away with the quality. It beats everything I have ever owned which includes numerous HP's & Canon printers. The ink is affordable also, in comparison to my Canon PIXMA & Selphy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small mighty only snapshot size but great.
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, seamless integration with home net, quiet, and easy for snapshots .
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Lehn

customer_reviews.title: Neat Little Printer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up with really nice color photo printing. The small size makes it very portable and it will fit on almost any desk. Overall very satisfied with this photo printer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. Sgueglia

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite printer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite printer!! I love the ability to email photos or send them over via WiFi. The quality is great and is fairly speedy with each print. I’m only mad I didn’t buy this one sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Hull

customer_reviews.title: This Epson PictureMate is great. Easy to install and used within minutes of ...
customer_reviews.text: This Epson PictureMate is great. Easy to install and used within minutes of setting up. Is small and compact and easy to take on trips. Has slot for SD cards. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: KatyinTexas

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Quality Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. A small photo printer that did not take up much room. More importantly, actually printed high quality pictures with no smudging or blemishes or lines through the photo. THANK YOU! Also, it prints 3.5x5, 4x6, and 5x7! Again, thank you. I love the convenience of printing in my own home when I want. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Customer123

customer_reviews.title: great prints and I can take my time deciding which ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! great prints and I can take my time deciding which pic to print and edit :)
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gaw

customer_reviews.title: This printer is great. I am please of the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great. I am please of the quality of the pictures that it produce doing print out. The colors are so vivid and clear. Great printer.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin E.

customer_reviews.title: Short return policy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this photo printer for a Christmas present, and have been attempting to get it to work ever since. Even with Epson customer service's "help", I have given up. Now I find that Amazon has a very short window of oportunity to return unsatisfactory purchases. Never order electronic devices through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JERRY D SAFERIGHT

customer_reviews.title: well worth the $ I like the 5x7 on ultra premium Epson paper
customer_reviews.text: well worth the $ I like the 5x7 on ultra premium Epson paper.dazzling photos!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy product and fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my non tech mother-in-law who complained no body wanted to develop photos that she took with her iPhone 6. It is very easy to pair with iPhone and photo quality is excellent and beyond expectation. The reason I take a star off is , I can't print with border if I print from iPhone, but I can print with border if I print from my Mac.
customer_reviews.author: BaoBao

customer_reviews.title: Excellent photo printer!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact fits in small shelf on desk. Prints quickly with nice quality and is dry coming out!
customer_reviews.author: Randy C. Dexter

customer_reviews.title: the pic quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it not compatible with my cell, but my friend has this machine and luvs it, the pic quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Filomena T. Masci

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for !
customer_reviews.text: I used to have use a Canon Selphy before it just stopped working. Honestly Im glad that it did! This printer is so much better quality and much truer color!
customer_reviews.author: Bazzilgirl

customer_reviews.title: PM 400 Outstanding Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing print quality for such a compact printer. Easy setup. The only issue is a lack of capacity in the paper tray.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to be able to print pics from my iPhone. The printer was easy for a non-tek person like myself to set up. Have been enjoying printing photos of grandkids sent via texts!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Photo Printer!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photo printer. Easy set up to work with Iphone 7 and MacBook Pro. Prints excellent quality photos that are dry immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer! Works great and had no issues with any Pictures I’ve printed
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bizzle

customer_reviews.title: Personal printer
customer_reviews.text: I only used the printer to set up and it printed a sample sheet only in black and white. So far from what I've seen I think I'M going to like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie V. Morton

customer_reviews.title: small v flexible photo printer
customer_reviews.text: compact footprint, but can do much more than just spit out 6x4 prints. Easy to set up on Wifi; High quality results, Early days so can't comment on ink usage/cost to run.
customer_reviews.author: T. Flemming

customer_reviews.title: Great photo printer.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can print 4X6 or 5X7 photos on this printer. The photo quality is outstanding. It was very easy to set up and install.
customer_reviews.author: Marcilene D. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: bought this for a gift

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Print
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the print was not great, whether it was a picture from a cell phone or from a DSR camera. It was very grainy so I was disappointed. Hope to find something else.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.text: 3 months after working decently, it suddenly stopped working. It would turn on, but it would not connect via USB or connect through wireless. Absolute waste of money.

product_meta.title: Epson PictureMate PM-400 Wireless Compact Color Photo Printer
product_meta.description: Style:Printer OnlyThis compact wireless printer makes it easy to print beautiful 4" X 6" And 5" X 7" Photos that will last up to 200 years this Epson printer is designed for use with only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as Compatible, may not function properly or at all. Epson provides information about the design of the printer on the box and in many other locations and materials Included with the printer and on the website. epson periodically provides firmware updates to address issues of security, performance, minor bug fixes and ensure the printer functions as designed. This printer was designed to work only with genuine Epson ink cartridges and some updates may affect the functionality of third party ink. Non-epson branded or Altered Epson cartridges that functioned prior to a firmware update may not continue to function.
feature_bullets: This printer is designed for use with Epson cartridges only, not third party cartridges or ink. Cartridges described as Compatible, Remanufactured, refilled or refillable may not work properly or at all. See product description for more details
Beautiful borderless photos - easily print high-quality 4"x6" & 5"x7" Photos
Ultra compact design - lightweight, portable printer saves space
Total Wireless solution - Print from iPad, iPhone, tablets and smartphones

Photo Print speed: 4" X 6" Borderless photo in as fast as 36 Sec (default mode: Color photo in default mode on Premium photo paper glossy measured from start of paper feed. Actual Print times will vary based on system configuration, software, and page complexity)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
